Package it.polito.dp2.NFV

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionPerformanceReader
    An interface for reading performance information.
    HostReader
    An interface for reading information about a host The name associated with this interface uniquely identifies the host in the DP2-NFV system.
    LinkReader
    An interface for accessing information about the existing connections between two network nodes inside a NF-FG.
    NamedEntityReader
    An interface for accessing the main information associated to a generic named entity (e.g., network node, server, etc.), associated to the NfvReader interface.
    NffgReader
    An interface for reading the data associated with a Network Function-Forwarding Graph (NF-FG).
    NfvReader
    An interface for reading information about the DP2-NFV system (fixed, revision1).
    NodeReader
    An interface for accessing the data associated with a network node inside an NF-FG.
    VNFTypeReader
    An interface for reading information about a type of VNF, including information about memory and storage required by this type of VNF.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NfvReaderFactory
    Defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain one or more objects implementing the NfvReader interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FunctionalType
    The Functional type of a network node indicates the network functionality implemented by that node.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NfvReaderException
    Thrown if an implementation of NfvReader cannot be created.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    FactoryConfigurationError
    Thrown if the implementation of the concrete factory is not available or cannot be instantiated.
